Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>, are you writing in a diary?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、はい…… クセになっちゃって……
Entry.EnglishText: Y-yes... It's become a habit of mine...

Entry.JapaneseText: マメね……私なんて、 三日も持てばいい方なのに……
Entry.EnglishText: You're rather meticulous... I'm the type to only keep it up for three days...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>は、おばちゃんの マネしちゃダメだぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Now, <Annie>, don't go taking after that old lady!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんた…… いいかげんにしないと、ぶつよ！
Entry.EnglishText: You... If you don't watch yourself, I'm going to smack you!
